value.title: EFFICIENT approach in Microsoft Teams for Power BI questions!
value.excerpt: Using Microsoft Teams? Have a central place for your Power BI folks in your organization? This efficient approach will help you to get your question to the right people! At the same time cutting down the noise for other folks.  Steve Campbell https://twitter.com/PowerBISteve https://www.linkedin.com/in/powerbisteve/
